## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | To ensure sufficient stock to cover forecasted demand and potential fluctuations, while also securing the 10% discount. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Recommended order is 15,000 units higher than player's planned order. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 5.4 days (based on current stock + recommended order) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 10 days (based on current stock + recommended order) |
| Comments                          | The player's planned order may not account for unexpected demand spikes. A larger order ensures ample stock to meet demand and provides a buffer against potential stockouts.  |
